response.overview: The film is a poignant personal memory quest that begins at the Bay of Diamant, in Martinique, and carries us to 3 continents, to shine light on what it means to be black today in a globally interconnected world, as seen through the eyes of Martinican artist Laurent Valère and his transatlantic dialogs with the black diaspora.
response.title: Tales from the Atlantic Beyond

results.name: Chœurs Atlantiques | Tales from the Atlantic Beyond (2024) - Official trailer with English subtitles
